column4: hello, can someone plse tell me what I am doing wrong in this SQL statement? 'INSERT INTO user VALUES ("'+edit2.text+'",0,0)'
wrong place, but reverse your single and double quotes
depends on your db, but most database use single quotes for values, not double
so use the single quote around the value, and the " to escape out
but in the future, this is #ubuntu, for ubuntu support. sql questions belong in another channel ;)
